verses.verse: The burden <S%H9294><s%> of the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning <S%H5921><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> [Thus] declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> who stretches <S%H5186><s%> out the heavens, <S%H8064><s%> lays <S%H3245><s%> the foundation <S%H3245><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> and forms <S%H3335><s%> the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of man <S%H120><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> him,

"Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I am going to make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a cup <S%H9371><s%> that causes reeling <S%H7478><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples <S%H5971><s%> around; <S%H5439><s%> and when the siege <S%H4692><s%> is against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> it will also <S%H1571><s%> be against <S%H5921><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day <S%H3117><s%> that I will make <S%H7760><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> a heavy <S%H4614><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> for all <S%H3605><s%> the peoples; <S%H5971><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> who lift <S%H6006><s%> it will be severely <S%H8295><s%> injured. <S%H8295><s%> And all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%> will be gathered <S%H622><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> it.

"In that day, <S%H3117><s%>" declares <S%H5002><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "I will strike <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> with bewilderment, <S%H8541><s%> and his rider <S%H7392><s%> with madness. <S%H7697><s%> But I will watch <S%H6491><s%> <S%H5869><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> while I strike <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> horse <S%H5483><s%> of the peoples <S%H5971><s%> with blindness. <S%H5788><s%>

"Then the clans <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> will say <S%H559><s%> in their hearts, <S%H3820><s%> 'A strong <S%H556><s%> support <S%H556><s%> for us are the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> through the Lord <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> their God. <S%H430><s%>'

"In that day <S%H3117><s%> I will make <S%H7760><s%> the clans <S%H441><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> like a firepot <S%H3595><s%> among pieces of wood <S%H6086><s%> and a flaming <S%H784><s%> torch <S%H3940><s%> among sheaves, <S%H5995><s%> so they will consume <S%H398><s%> on the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> and on the left <S%H8040><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the surrounding <S%H5439><s%> peoples, <S%H5971><s%> while the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> dwell <S%H3427><s%> on their own sites <S%H8478><s%> in Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"The Lord <S%H3068><s%> also will save <S%H3467><s%> the tents <S%H168><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> first <S%H7223><s%> in order <S%H4616><s%> that the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and the glory <S%H8597><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> may not be magnified <S%H1431><s%> above <S%H5921><s%> Judah. <S%H3063><s%>

"In that day <S%H3117><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> will defend <S%H1598><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and the one who is feeble <S%H3782><s%> among them in that day <S%H3117><s%> will be like David, <S%H1732><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> [will be] like God, <S%H430><s%> like the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> them.

"And it will come <S%H1961><s%> about in that day <S%H3117><s%> that I will set <S%H1245><s%> about <S%H1245><s%> to destroy <S%H8045><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the nations <S%H1471><s%> that come <S%H935><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

"And I will pour <S%H8210><s%> out on the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> and on the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> of grace <S%H2580><s%> and of supplication, <S%H8469><s%> so that they will look <S%H5027><s%> on Me whom <S%H834><s%> they have pierced; <S%H1856><s%> and they will mourn <S%H5594><s%> for Him, as one mourns <S%H5594><s%> for an only <S%H3173><s%> son, <S%H3173><s%> and they will weep <S%H4843><s%> bitterly <S%H4843><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> Him, like the bitter <S%H4843><s%> weeping <S%H4843><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> a first-born.

"In that day <S%H3117><s%> there will be great <S%H1431><s%> mourning <S%H4553><s%> in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> like the mourning <S%H4553><s%> of Hadadrimmon <S%H1910><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Megiddo. <S%H4023><s%>

"And the land <S%H776><s%> will mourn, <S%H5594><s%> every <S%H4940><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> by itself; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of David <S%H1732><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Nathan <S%H5416><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%>

the family <S%H4940><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%> the family <S%H4940><s%> of the Shimeites <S%H8097><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> by themselves; <S%H905><s%>
all <S%H3605><s%> the families <S%H4940><s%> that remain, <S%H7604><s%> every <S%H4940><s%> family <S%H4940><s%> by itself, <S%H905><s%> and their wives <S%H802><s%> by themselves. <S%H905><s%>
